Name: AdministrativeGenderVS
Title: Administrative Gender
Descriptino: A value set containing administrative gender codes from the FHIR core.

Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: AllLanguages
Title: All Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes all possible codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: PracticeSettingCodeValueSet
Title: Practice Setting Code Value Set
Descriptino: This is the code representing the clinical specialty of the clinician or provider who    interacted with, treated, or provided a service to/for the patient. The value set used    for clinical specialty has been limited by HITSP to the value set reproduced from HITSP    C80 Table 2-149 Clinical Specialty Value Set Definition.

Name: ConditionProblemDiagnosisCodes
Title: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
Descriptino: Example value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis codes.

Name: AdmitSource
Title: Admit Source
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate from where the patient came in.

Name: EncounterDiagnosisUse
Title: Encounter Diagnosis Use
Descriptino: What a specific Encounter/EpisodeOfCare `diagnosis.condition` is to be used for.

Name: EncounterDiet
Title: Diet
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate dietary preferences or restrictions a patient may have.

Name: DischargeDisposition
Title: Discharge Disposition
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to where the patient left the hospital.

Name: EncounterLocationStatus
Title: Encounter Location Status
Descriptino: The status of the location.

Name: ParticipantType
Title: Participant Type
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter.

Name: EncounterReasonCodes
Title: Encounter Reason Codes
Descriptino: This examples value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate reasons for an encounter.

Name: EncounterReasonUse
Title: Encounter Reason Use
Descriptino: What a specific Encounter/EpisodeOfCare `reason.value` is to be used for.

Name: SpecialArrangements
Title: Special Arrangements
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the kinds of special arrangements in place for a patients visit.

Name: SpecialCourtesy
Title: Special Courtesy
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate special courtesies provided to the patient.

Name: EncounterStatus
Title: Encounter Status
Descriptino: Current state of the encounter.

Name: EncounterSubjectStatus
Title: Encounter Subject Status
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the status of the subject within the encounter

Name: EncounterType
Title: Encounter Type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided.

Name: IdentifierTypeCodes
Title: Identifier Type Codes
Descriptino: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LinkType
Title: Link Type
Descriptino: The type of link between this Patient resource and another Patient/RelatedPerson resource.

Name: LocationCharacteristic
Title: Location Characteristic
Descriptino: Example Set of Location Characteristics

Name: LocationForm
Title: Location Form
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.

Name: LocationMode
Title: Location Mode
Descriptino: Indicates whether a resource instance represents a specific location or a class of locations.

Name: LocationStatus
Title: Location Status
Descriptino: Indicates whether the location is still in use.

Name: MaritalStatusCodes
Title: Marital Status Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

Name: NameUse
Title: NameUse
Descriptino: The use of a human name.

Name: PatientContactRelationship
Title: Patient Contact Relationship
Descriptino: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

Name: PractitionerRole
Title: Practitioner Role
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of a Practitioner.

Name: ServiceMode
Title: Service Mode
Descriptino: An example set of Service Modes that could be applicable to use to characterize HealthcareServices or PractitionerRoles while searching

Name: ServiceType
Title: Service Type
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

Name: EncounterClass
Title: Encounter class
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the class of encounter: a specific code indicating class of service provided.

Name: Hl7VSReAdmissionIndicator
Title: hl7VS-re-admissionIndicator
Descriptino: Value Set of codes which are used to specify that a patient is being re-admitted to a healthcare facility from which they were discharged, and indicates the circumstances around such re-admission.

Name: Hl7VSBedStatus
Title: hl7VS-bedStatus
Descriptino: Value Set of codes that specify the state of a bed in an inpatient setting, and is used to determine if a patient may be assigned to it or not.

Name: Hl7VSDegreeLicenseCertificate
Title: hl7VS-degreeLicenseCertificate
Descriptino: Concepts specifying an educational degree (e.g., MD).  Used in the CNN datatype (names and identifiers of clinicians) in Version 2 messaging.  Used in Version 2 messaging; note that in releases of HL7 prior to 2.3.1, was also used in person names (XPN), but this use was deprecated, then withdrawn in 2.7.

Name: ActPriority
Title: ActPriority
Descriptino: A code or set of codes (e.g., for routine, emergency,) specifying the urgency under which the Act happened, can happen, is happening, is intended to happen, or is requested/demanded to happen.    *Discussion:* This attribute is used in orders to indicate the ordered priority, and in event documentation it indicates the actual priority used to perform the act. In definition mood it indicates the available priorities.

Name: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
Title: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
Descriptino: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.

Name: AgeRangeVS
Title: Age Range
Descriptino: ValueSet including selected HMIS age ranges from the PeriodRangeCS CodeSystem

Name: ConditionSeverityVS
Title: Condition / Diagnosis Severity
Descriptino: Preferred value set for Condition/Diagnosis severity grading

Name: DistrictVS
Title: District
Descriptino: All district used in administrative divisions

Name: EducationalLevelVS
Title: Educational Level
Descriptino: Combined SNOMED CT, HL7 v3, and local codes for the highest level of education attained.

Name: EmploymentStatusVS
Title: Employment (रोजगारी स्थिति)
Descriptino: Codes representing employment status of a person.

Name: EthnicCodeVS
Title: Ethnic Code
Descriptino: ValueSet for जाति कोड (Ethnic Codes in Nepal)

Name: FreeCostVS
Title: Free Cost
Descriptino: ValueSet for Free Cost

Name: FreeServiceEligibilityVS
Title: Free Service Eligibility
Descriptino: ValueSet representing individuals eligible for free health services

Name: LocalBodyVS
Title: LocalBody
Descriptino: All LocalBody used in administrative divisions

Name: MaritalStatusVS
Title: Marital Status (वैवाहिक स्थिति)
Descriptino: Codes representing marital status of a person.

Name: OptionSetYesNoVS
Title: Option Set - Yes / No / Yes-only / Don't know / Not applicable / Positive / Negative
Descriptino: Master option set for Yes/No/Yes-only/Don't know/Not applicable, Positive/Negative questions, including Nepali designations:छ/छैन,  हो/होइन, गराएको/नगराएको, लिएको/नलिएको, भएको/नभएको, पास/फेल, पाएको/नपाएको Used for: - Presumptive TB Case (सम्भावित क्षयरोग विरामी) - Gender Based Violence (लैंगिक हिंसा) - Exclusively Breastfeeding (शिशुलाइ जन्मेको ६ महिना सम्म स्तनपान मात्र गराएको) - Complementary Food (६ महिना पछि स्तनपान साथै ठोस, अर्धठोस र नरम खाना सुरू) - GDS Present (General Danger Sign Present) - Chest Indrawing (Yes only) - Stridor (Yes only) - Wheezing (Yes only) - Condom Use - Lab test results (Positive/Negative)

Name: PatientRegistrationTypeVS
Title: Patient Registration Type
Descriptino: Patient registration types mapped to SNOMED CT concepts with Nepali display.

Name: ProvinceVS
Title: Province
Descriptino: All provinces used in administrative divisions

Name: ServiceAreaAddressVS
Title: Service Area Address Classification
Descriptino: Classification of address locations relative to the organization's service area and referral context, using SNOMED CT concepts to specify whether the address is inside or outside the service area and the type of location involved.

Name: ServiceTypeVS
Title: Service Type
Descriptino: Service Type

Name: VisitOrdinalVS
Title: Patient Visit Ordinal
Descriptino: ValueSet combining SNOMED CT codes for first and follow-up visits with local codes for second, third, and repeat visits.
